job_details.Functieomschrijving:
+ Leadership
       This is
       who
       we are
       Get to know us
     * Upskill Programs
     * We're here to help

   Developing on AWS

   9 September, 2024 - Hilversum, The Netherlands

   Over the last few years, Amazon Web Services (AWS) has become one of the leaders in the field of Cloud Technology, as well as a reliable partner for Cloud migrations or Greenfield Application Development. This 3-day workshop will give you practical experience with the most important AWS services. Gain practical experience with key AWS services and unleash your project's potential on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform.

   Book this training

   (excl. VAT) 3 days, Hilversum, English

   Looking to upskill your team(s) or organization?

   Max will gladly help you further with custom training solutions.

   Cloud Training Advisor

   What will you learn?

   In this 3-day course, you will discover core AWS services, their uses, and best practices. Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications using AWS. Acquire proficiency utilizing the AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development. Gain insights into the shared responsibility model, application lifecycle management, CI/CD pipelines, serverless applications, containerization, and AWS security best practices

    1. Understand core AWS services and architecture best practices.
    2. Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications on AWS.
    3. Utilize AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development.
    4. Apply cloud-native principles and write code for serverless applications.
    5. Implement CI/CD pipelines and containerize applications in the development process.
    6. Follow AWS security best practices for code authoring and maintenance.

   Using the AWS SDK

     * Set up the AWS and developer credentials for Java, C#/.NET, Python, and JavaScript.
     * Interact with AWS services and develop solutions by using the AWS SDK.

   Deployment at Scale

     * Use Amazon ElastiCache to improve application scalability.
     * Use containers in the development process.
     * Leverage the CI/CD pipeline to deploy applications on AWS.
job_details.full_text:
Certified Developer

+ Leadership
       This is
       who
       we are
       Get to know us
     * Upskill Programs
     * We're here to help

   Developing on AWS

   9 September, 2024 - Hilversum, The Netherlands

   Over the last few years, Amazon Web Services (AWS) has become one of the leaders in the field of Cloud Technology, as well as a reliable partner for Cloud migrations or Greenfield Application Development. This 3-day workshop will give you practical experience with the most important AWS services. Gain practical experience with key AWS services and unleash your project's potential on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform.

   Book this training

   (excl. VAT) 3 days, Hilversum, English

   Looking to upskill your team(s) or organization?

   Max will gladly help you further with custom training solutions.

   Cloud Training Advisor

   What will you learn?

   In this 3-day course, you will discover core AWS services, their uses, and best practices. Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications using AWS. Acquire proficiency utilizing the AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development. Gain insights into the shared responsibility model, application lifecycle management, CI/CD pipelines, serverless applications, containerization, and AWS security best practices

    1. Understand core AWS services and architecture best practices.
    2. Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications on AWS.
    3. Utilize AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development.
    4. Apply cloud-native principles and write code for serverless applications.
    5. Implement CI/CD pipelines and containerize applications in the development process.
    6. Follow AWS security best practices for code authoring and maintenance.

   Using the AWS SDK

     * Set up the AWS and developer credentials for Java, C#/.NET, Python, and JavaScript.
     * Interact with AWS services and develop solutions by using the AWS SDK.

   Deployment at Scale

     * Use Amazon ElastiCache to improve application scalability.
     * Use containers in the development process.
     * Leverage the CI/CD pipeline to deploy applications on AWS.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on a training workshop for AWS services and cloud development, rather than a specific AI or ML engineering role. It lacks the core responsibilities and technologies associated with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.

phrases: Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications using AWS
Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications on AWS
Utilize AWS service APIs, AWS CLI, and SDKs for application development
Use containers in the development process
Interact with AWS services and develop solutions by using the AWS SDK
Set up the AWS and developer credentials for Java, C#/.NET, Python, and JavaScript
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the process of building, integrating, and deploying applications, which is a core aspect of software development, particularly in a cloud environment.

phrases: Implement CI/CD pipelines and containerize applications in the development process
Leverage the CI/CD pipeline to deploy applications on AWS
job_tasks.justification: The mention of CI/CD pipelines and containerization directly relates to the operational aspects of deploying and managing applications, which aligns with MLOps principles, even if not explicitly AI/ML focused in this context.

phrases: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has become one of the leaders in the field of Cloud Technology, as well as a reliable partner for Cloud migrations or Greenfield Application Development.
unleash your project's potential on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of the business value and strategic importance of AWS in cloud technology and application development.

technologies.justification: AWS is explicitly mentioned as the primary cloud platform.
These are listed as languages for which AWS SDK credentials will be set up and used.
CI/CD pipelines and containerization are key components of MLOps and modern software deployment practices.
These are tools and interfaces used for interacting with and developing applications on AWS, which can be considered part of the broader data modeling and development ecosystem in a cloud context.

soft_skills.justification: The entire description is framed around learning and gaining practical experience with AWS services, highlighting the importance of continuous learning and adaptability in this domain.

phrases: Develop, deploy, and debug cloud-based applications
soft_skills.justification: The tasks involve developing, deploying, and debugging applications, which inherently requires problem-solving skills to address issues and create functional solutions.
